item.title: Top 10 Tools I found productive when working with TypeScript
item.description: 1. Volta Are you telling your team to install a particular version of Node.js for a project? Or working with multiple projects requiring different Node.js versions With Volta you can install multiple Node.js versions and can pin Node.js version for a project volta install node@v14.17.3 will install Node.js v14.17.3 volta pin node@16.15.0 will add entry in package.json file for Node v16.15.0 Volta will automatically switch Node versions for projects with pinned Node.

item.title: Stencil for React Devs
